Es el Shooter por excelencia, todo el que quiera experimentar el competitivo en estado puro tiene jugarlo, a veces te sentirás frustrado, pero con unas horas de juego en la que calientes muñeca verás como progresas y vas subiendo. Suerte a todos en esa carrera hacia Global.
Let's Go!

Po ostatniej aktualizacji zepsuli tą grę. Z gry o wojnie terrorystów z antyterrorystami zrobił się Fortnite. Fajnie że jest nowa operacji, ale nie tego się spodziewałem. Chciałem coś w stylu operacji hydra czy wildfire a nie Fortnite 2.

So Valve, are you guys ok ? Are you guys running out of money? What kind of a joke is this? costumizing? Seems like you are listening to the kidengarden players.. CSGO is a SKIL game. Not a fantasy slpash art ... needles to say what game it is... If you really need to make more money that bad, just publish that , simple right? Stop with this bullshit... This wont bring CSGO back to life.. game is dead... Literaly by cheaters. I guess you know that right-? Thats why you are Prime account? =) I wonder ... KNIFES are ok i guess.. skins at some point gets just pointless... and now this? Who´s ideas was this? If there is anyone on this company that acutally gives a danm about the game, pls make sure to wake the person who is make this HUGE mistake, implementing this  bullshit system of rewards.
